my:Details.my:Title: Mooring / Unmooring (incl. Shifting on Vessel's Ropes)

my:Hazard.my:Description: Communication between the bridge and mooring station

my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: Maintenance and inspections to be carried out in accordance with the Manufacturer's Manual and Company MPM system.
Safe and adequate mooring monitoring position by OOW.
Crew must be vigilant and ensure their feet are clear of any rope bights at all times.

my:Main.my:Footer: Risk Assessment: D 02 - Mooring / Unmooring (incl. Shifting on Vessel's Ropes)
